evidence_example.title: RES_SCHEDULER example
evidence_example.small_descr: This small example shows the usage of the RES_SCHEDULER resource.
evidence_example.long_descr:
This small example shows the usage of the RES_SCHEDULER resource. <ul>
The demo is basically composed by a task which periodically flashes a led, and by a low priority task which executes and periodically lock RES_SCHEDULER. <ul>
